description: The article "Align The Misaligned" discusses the fragmentation of the internet, comparing it to tectonic shifts. It challenges the idea of restoring the original internet, instead proposing to embrace fragmentation as an opportunity for growth. The piece explores different perspectives on internet fragmentation and advocates for an ecosystem architecture approach to create a more resilient and inclusive digital future.
excerpt: The internet has fragmented like tectonic shifts, but this isn't necessarily negative. Ecosystem architecture views this as an opportunity for growth and innovation. Different regions have developed unique solutions, making the global internet ecosystem more resilient and diverse.
